description:
gc: fix build under clang

Enables building go with CC=clang, for the 3.1 (svn) version
of clang.  Most changes are adding braces, as quietgcc invokes
cc with -Werror, and clang now includes -Wdangling-else in its
set of warning flags.  There were also -Wunused-result
warnings-as-errors in [68]g's stub of -X support.

Fixes issue 2878.

messages.text:
Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

I'd like you to review this change to
https://go.googlecode.com/hg/

subject: code review 5626051: gc: fix build under clang
